description: This file sets up a knowledge base and an agent using the agno framework, loads documents and text into the knowledge base, and performs responses to queries asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: LightRagKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads documents and text for retrieval augmented generation.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A language model class from the agno.models.anthropic module.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base from specified URLs and local paths.

methods.name: load_text
methods.description: Loads raw text into the knowledge base.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a given prompt.

calls: asyncio.run(knowledge_base.load_text(text="Dogs and cats are not pets, they are friends."))
asyncio.run(agent.aprint_response("Which candidates are available for the role of a Senior Software Engineer?"))
